CustomField.description: This shows the special terms from the quote to be displayed on the contract object, so that it can be displayed on the case overview
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Global Volume Discount"), "Global Volume Discount" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Mobildækning - Eksisterende Lokaliteter"), "Mobildækning - Eksisterende Lokaliteter" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Mobildækning - Nye Lokaliteter"), "Mobildækning - Nye Lokaliteter" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Benchmark - 10%"), "Benchmark - 10%" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Benchmark - 15%"), "Benchmark - 15%" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Benchmark - 20%"), "Benchmark - 20%" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Årlig Reduktion - 5%"), "Årlig Reduktion - 5%" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Årlig Reduktion - 10%"), "Årlig Reduktion - 10%" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Rapportering"), "Rapportering" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Forlængelse 2 Gange 12 Måneder - 5% Rabat"), "Forlængelse 2 Gange 12 Måneder - 5% Rabat" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Forlængelse 2 Gange 12 Måneder - Uandret Priser og Vilkår"), "Forlængelse 2 Gange 12 Måneder - Uandret Priser og Vilkår" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Driftshåndbog"), "Driftshåndbog" + BR(), NULL) + IF(AND(INCLUDES( SBQQ__Quote__r.Additional_Special_Terms_on_Contract__c , "Undtaget fra prisindeksering"), Exempt_for_price_index_regulation__c = TRUE), "Undtaget fra prisindeksering" + BR(), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the special terms from the quote
CustomField.label: Special terms from quote
